name: Clutter VI: Leigh's Story
description:
The best Clutter yet by far. With Leigh's Story, the Clutter series has risen to a whole new level. For the first time, there is a compelling story with gameplay to match. Additionally, many new Clutter styles of play have been added, including, "Head To Head", "Clutter Chaos" and "Twos & Threes". There is truly something here for everyone. All your old favorites are back as well and there are more Clutter 100 levels in Leigh's Story, than ever before.

Features:
  • Over 500 New Objects
  • Over 800 Levels
  • Over 20 hours of Gameplay
  • 75+ Picture Puzzles, 75+ Box Quotes
  • Puzzles Randomly generated levels provide hours and hours of replayability
